short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control your workday - pomodoro timer with website distraction

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost your productivity and reclaim your focus with our browser extension, "PulseTomato: Pomodoro, No Distractions." This tool combines the proven effectiveness of the Pomodoro Technique with a website distraction-blocking feature, helping you stay on track and make the most out of your work sessions.

Key Features:

1. Pomodoro Timer: Embrace the renowned Pomodoro Technique to enhance your time management skills. Immerse yourself in focused work with timed intervals, followed by short breaks to maintain peak productivity. The timer keeps you disciplined, breaking down your work into manageable, focused sessions.
2. Distraction Blocker: Bid farewell to time-wasting websites that hinder your concentration. Our distraction blocker prevents access to specified websites during your work sessions, allowing you to create a serene and focused digital workspace. Add your custom sites to the blocklist.

How it Works:

1. Activate Pomodoro Timer: Start a focused work session with the Pomodoro timer, ensuring your productivity reaches new heights.
2. Distraction-Free Mode: Enable the distraction blocker to temporarily restrict access to distracting websites during your work intervals.
3. Take Breaks: Relax and recharge during the short breaks, knowing that the extension will guide you back to focused work when the time is right.

Embrace the power of the "PulseTomato: Pomodoro, No Distractions." to transform your work habits. Say goodbye to distractions and hello to heightened focus and efficiency. Download the extension now and take control of your workday!
